description: Unique identifier for this attachment record.
Foreign key linking the attachment to the specific Work Order–Asset Procedure record it belongs to.
Reference to the attached file or document (e.g., file ID or storage path). Likely identifies the stored media for this record; confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether this attachment should be included when printing the work order or procedure (1=yes, 0=no).
Free-text notes about the attachment’s content or usage.
System timestamp of the most recent change to this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record; field name suggests a user identifier but stores a datetime—confirm with SME.
Flag indicating whether the attachment should display as a thumbnail or preview (1=yes, 0=no).
Identifier of the user who created this attachment record.
Timestamp when the creating user saved this attachment record.
Identifier of the user who last updated this attachment record.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated update to this record.
